The video was published on Facebook on J: 2021, and it shows people lying on mats on the floor of a stadium.
The Thai: language caption of the post translates to indicate that the video was taken at Sanam Mahachai Samut Sakhon Hospital in Thailand, where Myanmar people were isolated with barbed-wires.
The claim is false: as the video actually shows a quarantine center in Malaysia, specifically the Pahang Sports Complex Indoor Stadium (Sukpa) in Pahang state.
The Pahang State Government published a: 2020, confirming that the Covid-19 Quarantine and Treatment Centre at Sukpa Stadium had closed after all 168 foreigners recovered and were allowed to go home.
